verses.name: Ecclesiastes 2:23
verses.text: For all his days are sorrows, and his travail grief; yea, his heart taketh not rest in the night. This is also vanity.

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 2:24
verses.text: There is nothing better for a man, than that he should eat and drink, and that he should make his soul enjoy good in his labour. This also I saw, that it was from the hand of God.

verses.name: Ecclesiastes 2:25
verses.text: For who can eat, or who else can hasten hereunto, more than I?
